list.name: Changes
list.comment:
refactor(css): clean up reset, fonts, and variables layers
- Group reset rules for better readability and consistency - Remove duplicate declarations (background, border, outline) - Simplify font-family variables (heading inherits body) - Organize CSS custom properties by category (fonts, colors, spacing, etc.) - Replace repeated HSL values with existing variables - Maintain clear layer separation for scalability

task.summary: `Feat:setup new style.css and refactor html code to remove redundants`

feat(css): implement responsive background shapes with multiple backgrounds + image-set() - Replaced messy tags with a single .bg-shapes layer - Used multiple backgrounds in CSS to position all decorative shapes - Applied media queries for layout-specific swaps (mobile / tablet / desktop) - Integrated image-set() for high-DPI screens to ensure crisp visuals - Result: cleaner HTML, more responsive backgrounds, and sharper assets on Retina devices

feat(css): implement responsive background shapes with multiple backgrounds + image-set() - Replaced messy tags with a single .bg-shapes layer - Used multiple backgrounds in CSS to position all decorative shapes - Applied media queries for layout-specific swaps (mobile / tablet / desktop) - Integrated image-set() for high-DPI screens to ensure crisp visuals - Result: cleaner HTML, more responsive backgrounds, and sharper assets on Retina devices Signed-off-by: mohammed el aouri
